Html: Following along in the Documentation my properties page for SQL Power Doc v1.0.2.1.zip does not have an 'unblock' button or even a security section. There is a security tab but does not have any unblock option either. It does show I have Full control. I am using Windows 7. I assume this is an important step as the 'Get-WindowsInventoryToClixml.ps1' script does not run. How do I unblock the zip file before extracting?

If you're running PowerShell 3.0 or higher (highly recommended) you can use the Unblock-File cmdlet. See http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh849924(v=wps.620).aspx for the documentation on it.

(Come to think of it, I should add this to the documentation!)

--Kendal
